titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 66 South Broad Street in Pawcatuck, Connecticut, as the "Vincent F. Faulise Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/19/2002--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 66 South Broad Street in Pawcatuck, Connecticut as the Vincent F. Faulise Post Office Building.
